column3: hɔn a wosian kɔ Egypt kɔhwehwɛ mboa
column4: na wɔdze hɔnho dan mpɔnkɔ; na wɔtwer ntseaseanam
column7: ɔnam hɔn ahoɔdzen dodow ntsi; na mbom wɔnnhwɛ Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no

column4: na ɔnnkɛsan ne nsɛm: na ɔbɔsoɛr etsia ndzebɔnyɛfo fi
column5: na hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛfo mboa."

column3: na nnyɛ Nyankopɔn bi a; hɔn mpɔnkɔ so enam a
column4: na nnyɛ sunsum bi a: na sɛ EWURADZE nya tsen ne nsa a
column6: na nyia wɔboa no so ahwe ase
column7: na hɔn nyina abɔ mu ayɛ gyan."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE ase me nye yi
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ ogyata anaa ogyatafɔr pɔw wɔ n’afonam do
column4: na sɛ wɔfrɛ nguanhwɛfo dodow dɛn ara ba no do mpo a
column6: na hɔn dede remma ɔmmbrɛ noho adze no: dɛmara so na dɔm EWURADZE besian abɔko wɔ Zion bepɔw

column3: dɛm na dɔm EWURADZE botwitwa agye Jerusalɛm; obotwitwa agye no na oeyi no efi mu
hom nsan mbra nyia hom fi no hɔ atsew etua kɛsekɛse no nkyɛn."

column2: "Na da no mu hɔn mu nyimpa biara bɔtow ne dwetɛ ehonyi
column3: na ne sika ehonyi a homankasa hom nsa ayɛ ama hom bɔn no egu."

column2: "Ɔno na Asirianyi bɔtɔ afona a ɔnnyɛ nyimpa dze no ano
column3: na afona a ɔnnyɛ adasa dze no edzi ne nam: na obefi afona enyim eguan
column4: na ɔdze ne mberantsɛ etua amantow."

column2: "Na no botan botwa mu akɔ ɔnam hu ntsi
column3: na n’asafohen bo etutu wɔ frankaa no ntsi
column4: EWURADZE a ne gya wɔ Zion
column5: na no fononoo wɔ Jerusalɛm no na ɔse."
